title: 1902–03 Rangers F.C. season
text:
The 1902–03 season is the 29th season of competitive <a href="Association%20football">football</a> by <a href="Rangers%20F.C.">Rangers</a>.
Overview.
Rangers played a total of 29 competitive matches during the 1902–03 season. The team finished third in <a href="Scottish%20Football%20League%20Division%20One">Scottish League Division One</a>, eight points behind champions <a href="Hibernian%20F.C.">Hibernian</a>. The team managed twelve wins from the twenty-two league matches.
The <a href="Scottish%20Cup">Scottish Cup</a> campaign ended in success as the team defeated <a href="Hearts%20F.C.">Hearts</a> 2–0 in the second final replay. The two previous final matches were a 1–1 and 0–0 draw and all were played at <a href="Celtic%20Park">Celtic Park</a>, <a href="Glasgow">Glasgow</a>.
Results.
All results are written with Rangers' score first.
